name: Ribombee
description: The Bee Fly Pokémon. Rain makes pollen damp, so Ribombee hates rain. When it sees ominous clouds, it finds a hollow in a tree, where it waits stock-still.

abilities.name: Honey Gather
abilities.description: At the end of each battle, this Pokémon may roll a d20 + its proficiency bonus. On a result of 20 or higher, its trainer adds a Honey to their inventory.

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.description: Once per long rest, this Pokémon can ignore a negative status condition that results from an enemy move.

abilities.name: Sweet Veil
abilities.description: Any ally within 15 feet of this Pokémon is immune to the sleep condition.
